sentences.en: As business was slack she packed up early.
sentences.cn: 由于生意萧条她早早打烊了.

sentences.en: as domestic demand starts to flag, foreign demand will help pick up the slack.
sentences.cn: 由于国内需求开始萎缩，外贸需求将有助弥补损失。

sentences.en: Ask them to be more careful. Don't let them get slack.
sentences.cn: 你要他们仔细点, 不要马马虎虎.

sentences.en: Business remained slack throughout the day.
sentences.cn: 一整天生意都很冷清。

sentences.en: He is always slack in doing his homework.
sentences.cn: 他做作业总是马马虎虎.

sentences.en: He just gazed at me slack-jawed.
sentences.cn: 他张大了嘴巴，吃惊地盯着我。

sentences.en: He pulled in the slack of the rope.
sentences.cn: 他收紧松垂的绳索.

sentences.en: He was accused of slacking and taking too many holidays.
sentences.cn: 他被指责工作不努力，休假太多。

sentences.en: Keep the rope slack until I tell you to pull it.
sentences.cn: 让绳子松着，直到我叫你拉紧。

sentences.en: Many publishers have simply become far too slack.
sentences.cn: 许多出版商就是变得过于懈怠了。

sentences.en: Please slack up your speed. I can't run as fast as you!
sentences.cn: 请你跑慢点! 我跑得没你快.

sentences.en: She was shocked at the slack discipline in the school.
sentences.cn: 对于学校松弛的纪律她感到震惊.

sentences.en: She was staring into space, her mouth slack.
sentences.cn: 她双唇微张，失神地望着前方。

sentences.en: Slack defending by Real Madrid allowed Manchester United to score.
sentences.cn: 皇家马德里队松懈的防守使曼联队得以进球得分。

sentences.en: Slack off those ropes there ; there's a storm coming!
sentences.cn: 把那里的绳索放松, 暴风雨就要来了!

sentences.en: Slack the rope before trying to untie the knot.
sentences.cn: 解结之前先将绳索放松.

sentences.en: Slack up the tent ropes before it rains.
sentences.cn: 在下雨之前把帐篷的绳子放松.

sentences.en: Some are hard at work and some are slack in work.
sentences.cn: 有的勤奋工作,有的则消极怠工.

sentences.en: The boy's jaw went slack.
sentences.cn: 男孩张大了嘴巴。

sentences.en: Winter is the slack season at most hotels.
sentences.cn: 对大多数旅馆来说,冬天是淡季.
